column2: Ndrumbea: [ɳɖùmbea]) is a commune in the suburbs of Nouméa in the South Province of New Caledonia
column3: an overseas territory of France in the Pacific Ocean. The population of the commune was 35
column4: 873 according to the 2019 census.From 1904 to 1940 the town was linked to Nouméa by the Nouméa-Païta railway.
